subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Ruslan Fedotenko scored two of the team’s four power-play goals and the Islanders beat the host Toronto Maple Leafs, 5-4, Thursday night for their second victory in a row.
snippet: Ruslan Fedotenko scored two of the team’s four power-play goals and the Islanders beat the host Toronto Maple Leafs, 5-4, Thursday night for their second victory in a row.
